post.body: Yay keep me posted!
I agree I leave for Idaho on Dec 21st so we should try and work something out before then
Thanks *hugs* and ditto <3
I don't honestly know how I am doing *sigh*
*hugs* that happens to me all the time.
hugs
wtf thats weird
hahaha that nearly made me spit my drink.
*Sends warm thoughts* same here
OMG I know how that goes I just sat outside on the phone with my gma for 40 min in the cold
i hope he is alright! I had to be rushed to the er with one when I was 8 or 9 so I know how that goes
If this was anywhere but twitter that would make you sound like a crazy person hehe
agreed!
Yay! I think we should have a massive night of movie watching and junk food eating.
aww well I leave in like 10 days so if it doesn't work out before hand we are SO doing something after I get back on the 5th
aww well i will gladly give you e-snuggles and hugs but i sadly cannot help with the vacation. We must get together soon!
is there anything I can do to help hon?
*big hugs*
haha yes SO MUCH WIN and the boots <3
OMG YES YOU DO!
bummer
It might not work with prepay
Sounds like a party count me in! Would that magic mans name happen to be Naboo?
I see you make a habit out of hitting on IT staff Mr.Reynholm but I can't say I oppose to the idea not like Jen.
eat a bowl of cookies with milk on them =0)
I know! Like anyone can truly master the web psh. =0)
can you be online?
can i be your vince plz?
sounds like fun i may end up doing the same thing! Wish i could watch it with you happy new year darlin <3
Of course now i cant get back to sleep damn cat
I was just woken up by the sound of our 15 pound cat trying to jump up on something and missing. Going back to sleep now.
tweeters I think I am gonna be heading to bed I am super tired. Goodnight <3
My arms are really sore and I have no idea why.
I can haz? http://tinyurl.com/58hnuk its only 2,100....yeah ok I know i can't haz.
to anyone that knits or crochets do you find it easier to handle if you put your yarn in a ball first?
maybe I will work on some knitting instead....now if I can just remember how to start the scarf..
tried laying down couldn't get comfy *sigh* gonna watch a movie I think
Still feeling pretty awful thing I might lay down for a while
I feel icky. Trying to decide if I want to make the trek over to my gmas or not. I think I am leaning towards not.
Heading out to the thrift store now.
Oh man so how did I fail to mention that on the 24th of next month The Phenomenauts are playing with Jason Webley!Weird combo but DREAM SHOW
Got all distracted chatting. Now I am gonna get dressed and head downtown to the thrift store
I just got a huge box of yarn and tea from the amazing @scifichick25 THANK YOU SO MUCH!! Lots of love honey<3 That was so sweet.
Dear,Cat Why do you insist on crapping right in front of your litter box? Is it really that hard to just step inside and go?! Love, Me
I should really do laundry today.
wow I am actually excited about the fact that its supposed to be 64 degrees today...I can haz summer now?!?
well hello there tweeters! I slept and slept and then kept sleeping! On the upside I feel well rested.
I am falling asleep over here I think its time I head to bed goodnight <3
been working on the Napa Valley Save Darfur group on facebook if you are in the Napa valley and interested in joining please let me know
Ended up at another thrift store got a skirt. now to pick up my meds and then to my dad
Had lunch then another thrift store the get my meds then to my dads
http://twitpic.com/pxmp - Damn those shifty sifters
Just got a sweet super 80s jacket at the thrift store for 1.99 Now lunch
my dad is here so I am heading out to his house tweet you soon!
All must fear my Dalek hat! http://i38.tinypic.com/n172g5.jpg Tell me that you see it too? For comparison http://i37.tinypic.com/2rd97ih.jpg
Oh yeah also my dad will be here in like an hour I am going up to his house for today and part of tomorrow to get some of my winter clothing
Dear unsteady hands,I hate you! I had to redo my eyeliner twice because of you!
Just spoke to a lady from the Napa Lit program about reading for story time with kids twice a month I am excited I meet with her on Mon.
I'm awake. Hell if I know why though its way too early but I woke up and couldn't get back to sleep *sigh*
Forgot to tweet that i was going to the er bad reaction to meds home and fine with happy sleepy drugs now
Forget it I am too tired will watch it tomorrow bed now tweeters goodnight <3
also you should all check out Polly Scattergood because she is amazing and I love her music http://tinyurl.com/3qhrww
got distracted now I'm watching the new episode of nevermind the buzzcocks.
I am sleepy! gonna watch the new episode of nevermind the buzzcocks then bed.
Watching the new episode of the office
Home finally sheesh what a long day. But I got the most amazing skinny leg corset jeans I can't wait to wear them!
Just saw a car with a viva colbert sticker it made me happy
Omfg that was so much food so good though. Heading back to napa now
Eating indian food in berkley malsa dosa mmm
Got a bunch of stuff heading back to napa now
Awake eating breakfast then going to get stuff out storage
I haven't tweeted in 5 hours zomg! Home now just been hanging out with my dad and his gf and knitting. Heading to bed soonish.
Went and played a few bucks at the casino now eating dinner
http://twitpic.com/qs90 - Fyi this is a pummelo
At the grocery store with my gma got a pumello yum!
My gma called just as i got downtown and wanted me to run some errands with her so im waiting for her to pick me up now
eating then going downtown to see Brian
ack i need to stop biting my nails especially when they have nail polish on them!
http://twitpic.com/qoby my 2nd scarf but it turned out way too short for an adult so i will give it to my cousin for xmas.
i just finished my 2nd scarf! Now I am trying to figure out how to remove it from the loom haha
I woke up with a bit of a sore throat hopefully it will go away
heading to bed goodnight tweeters
I am tired but I don't wanna go to bed
fell asleep during wall-e good thing I had already seen it! Eating black bean soup now mmm then new episode of the IT crowd.
Home now watching wall-e and getting ready to eat diner
heading downtown
trying to eat something and relax i'm still feeling the effects of the meds. Gonna head downtown and see brian in a few
They told me not to go to the doc today just to keep my appt on mon
BED! Goodnight tweeters <3
I have no words to express how much I love the song Electric feel by MGMT
I should take a shower and head to bed soonish but I don't want to *pout*
hanging out with friends was supposed to happen but this is looking like that will not be the case =0(
OMFG the next new episode of Merlin looks epic.
where has the weekend gone? I am just now getting around to last nights episode of Merlin.
Dear pummelo I just wanted to free you from your citrus prison and enjoy your tasty insides why did you have to be such a delicious bitch?
going to go peel and eat my pummelo <3
Home now. My grandmas dog fell asleep on my lap on the way home and shortly after I fell asleep and had a nice nap hehe
Damn its foggy
Heading home now
Still in windsor getting ready to eat mmm veggie burger
Going to windsor with my gparents to look at my aunts new house
I'm awake!
So tired going to bed goodnight tweeters
Just read a recipe for Chinese cabbage soup with tomato and tofu it sounds SO good I want some now.
i have the hiccups
dear itunes STFU I don't wanna update you so stop asking.
Feeling a bit better not really tired think I'm gonna watch a movie
home now even though I probably should have stayed at my grandmas when I knew I was coming home to an empty house I feel so awful.
I could kill my father
heading over to my grandmas for a bit
Hey look who is doing her laundry meeeee!
i need to get off my ass and either do laundry or walk down and drop off my prescription.
I need to do laundry!
poor man finally figured it out and apparently it wasn't paid for so I gotta pay 15 for it when I get there.
I am on hold with the airline trying to find out if my grandmother paid for my checked bag or not and I think i've confused the poor man.
why hey there tweeters I am a sleepy head that just woke up.
think i'm gonna head to bed goodnight tweeters
dear itunes going from AFI to Queen is quite a strange transition.
I have been a knitting fool! Taking a break for a bit cause my hand is sore.
Re my previous tweet. I have rage can't they just say hey its gonna be really fucking cloudy?!
http://twitpic.com/rbv0 - I was looking up the extended forecast for Idaho when I saw this. What does that even mean?!
Home from the meeting with the Napa Lit lady it went wonderfully I am now officially a volunteer for the Napa Lit program!
Brrr its cold
I should be leaving for my dr's appointment soon.
why is it I am always loosing my earrings? I have 3 different pairs of peace sign earrings but i can't seem to find a pair *grumbles*
brrr i'm cold but i'm up and should be getting dressed and ready for my doctors appointment.
i have the hiccups again and I am heading to bed because I have to be up early to go to the doctor. Goodnight tweeters <3
ran out of room in my last tweet.I am taking that news harder then I thought I would. Leo is a good man and I wish I could go say goodbye.
my grandma just called to tell me that her best friends husband is dying and they have to take their grandson to the airport tomorrow.
watching blade runner even though i should be in bed cause i gotta be up early.
I really need to be working on my knitting not sitting here surfing the web and tweeting.
i have the hiccups!
gonna get some dinner and try to feel less bitchy =0(
this amused me greatly http://tinyurl.com/6eumta
home now because i found myself in a terrible mood and didn't feel at all like playing with my cousin.
bed now goodnight tweeters
my feet hurt stupid heels! What made me think it was a good idea to wear them?
Home from the party now I had a surprisingly good time. Gonna watch the new episode of Merlin then head to bed.
leaving soon to go to the party
Therese is here yay havent seen her in ages
going downtown to see Brian then going to a party later tonight.
I have a headche sigh
Im awake kind of....just laying here bundled up in my blanket
I didn't knit at all today *sigh* heading to bed with the intention of getting knitting done in the morning goodnight tweeters <3
ate half a can of chili go me. *sigh* ok going to watch BSG now.
eating something because I haven't really eaten anything decent in about 2 days now *sigh* I wish i got hungry like a normal person.
I have been talked into watching the new Battlestar galactica so I am getting ready to give it a shot.
new episode of the IT crowd = HILARIOUS
also I am home now and its freezing out
Brian said he would come with me to the napa valley unity league xmas party tomorrow night! Yay I don't have to go alone.
FINALLY heading downtown damn Melody way to be distracted for like ever.
Finally packing because i have put it off too long
home now brr it was cold but my coat kept me cozy.
http://twitpic.com/ugm1 - The white isicle factory threw up on this house
walking to the store to get a soda brrr its cold
oh man craziness Carolers in a horse drawn carriage just went down my street.
New episode of the IT crowd <3
home now getting ready to put laundry in.
heading to the library then downtown to see Brian and work.
waiting for my dad to come drop some stuff off.
doh unintentional xmas outfit green skirt with my new red hair. =0( I hate xmas.
my dad is on his way into town to drop some stuff off guess i should get dressed.
so i've got a list made of things I need to get done but here I sit doing nothing *sigh*
Awake trying to jot down things that need to get done before i leave
Note to self list for trip:address 4 post cards.cell phone fix.laundry.pharmacy.hem pants.vitamins
Bed time goodnight tweeters <3
the time has come for me to start freaking out about being ready for my trip *sigh*
Got into a big fight with my gma long story short I am staying with my friend izzy until I go home.
Spending the night at my cousins house with internet omg yay!
http://twitpic.com/ytab - Got back into town to see this there is a storm coming
http://twitpic.com/yt10 - Went up to idaho city lots of snow
Hope all you tweeters are having a good new years day
No the are on my myspace myspace.com/oddorable and he isnt right next to me
Since im still idaho new years came sooner then normal for me this year so happy new years and best wishes tweeters!
Having a dull new years eve switching between the absolutely fabulous and twilight zone marathons
I am so freaking bored hope everyone is having a good new years eve
staying at Izzy's again. His house is freezing and I think I am coming down with a cold.
got the computer mostly fixed. Looks like I may end up staying with Izzy again tonight lots of family drama happening because of that.
OMFG I HAVE ANGER! Seriously I don't know how I am ever gonna work in IT when i get this mad over computer problems.
Jesus my friends computer is so messed up its gonna take me ages to fix.
Watching the dr who xmas special while i virus scan my friends other computer omfg I am so excited =0)
up early can't sleep and need to work on fixing my friends computer.
http://twitpic.com/xuqx - Me and my bestest friend
We are driving to boise and its hailing
